subject: Verify email to reset nmTeam account password
title: Verify email to reset nmTeam account password
para_tks: We have received a request that you wish to reset the password of your nmTeam account. Please click the button below to verify your email and continue the reset process.
para_backup: If you cannot click the button to complete the verification, please open this page in your browser to complete the verification.
para_why: Please do not give this link to anyone, even if he claims to be from nmTeam.
para_measure: If you did not request to reset your nmTeam account password, please delete this email, your account is still safe.
